details.title: Gibson.app - Full Stack Development
details.description: As a Junior Software Developer at Gibson Brands, I play a pivotal role in the comprehensive development of Gibson.app. My responsibilities span both frontend and backend, contributing to the creation of a seamless user experience.

details.title: Frontend Technologies
details.description: Utilizing cutting-edge technologies, my toolkit includes Next.js for building robust frontend interfaces, Tailwind CSS for efficient styling, and Firebase to handle frontend-backend interactions.

details.title: Backend Development with Laravel
details.description: In parallel, I served as a Laravel Developer, crafting REST APIs that seamlessly integrate with the Next.js app. Notable achievements include implementing features like Stripe promo code integration and validation, providing users with custom checkout experiences using the React.js Stripe package.

details.title: Key Achievements
details.description: Over the past 7 months, I've been instrumental in evolving Gibson.app. My role involves continuous collaboration with cross-functional teams to implement new features, resolve bugs, and enhance the overall performance of the website.

details.title: Web and Mobile App Development
details.description: Led full-stack development initiatives for diverse projects, including portfolio websites, travel accommodation apps, e-commerce applications, and streamlined booking websites.

details.title: Technological Expertise
details.description: Proficient in utilizing React.js, React Native, Next.js, and Laravel to build robust REST APIs, manage databases, and integrate third-party APIs. Skilled in crafting visually stunning UI using Bootstrap and implementing dynamic front-end interactions with jQuery.

details.title: Testing and Deployment
details.description: Ensured code reliability and efficiency through rigorous testing methodologies. Implemented seamless deployment practices for efficient project delivery.
